original_text: After Paul arrived in Caesarea, he went to Jerusalem. He said, ‘hello’ to the group of believers there. Then he travelled to Antioch in Syria.
korean_text: 가이사랴에 상륙하여 올라가 교회의 안부를 물은 후에 안디옥으로 내려가서

sentences.original_text: He said, 'hello' to the group of believers there
Then he travelled to Antioch in Syria
